Articles.Content:
The only modification here is MechJeb 1.9.8. The idea is to get a UFO in orbit, but the current design can't stabilize at 100 km. Hopefully some of you will be interested in tinkering with it! I'm still very very very new. Only had the game for about a week now.

(All the screenshots were about 1.3m, so sorry for the links)
